description: Manx drivers will be able to pay in six-monthly instalments from "later this year", a minister says.
title: Six-month vehicle tax to be introduced on Isle of Man
title_page: Six-month vehicle tax to be introduced on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: The minister added that while paper tax discs would be kept for the time being, the "routine" use of Automatic Number Plate Recognition technology meant they could be phased out in future "if that was seen to offer an overall benefit".
